channel.title: Pj Advection on Peng Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in Pj Advection on Peng Zhao

item.title: Advection campaign at Torgnon started
item.description: At the beginning of July, Kathi and I went to the Aosta Valley to set up the advection measurement at Torgnon. Thanks a lot to Marta and other colleagues! Our institute is collecting post cards from the fieldwork in the meanwhile. Here is one from us.

item.title: Advection campaign at Neustift started
item.description: Last Thursday, Kathi^2, Peng and Georg were at Neustift to set up the advection equipment for the final campaign this year. Here you can find a video which compresses a few hours of work into 25 s.

item.title: EcoBot measurements during ScaleX 2016
item.description: Yesterday Kathi and Peng went to Fendt to support UAV-based thermal imaging by Claire Brenner (BOKU, Vienna) with ground-validation EcoBot measurements.

item.title: Advection campaign within ScaleX 2016
item.description: The last two days part of the group was in Fendt (Bavaria) to set up the advection measurement system as part of the 2016 ScaleX campaign.

item.title: First advection campaign completed
item.description: Last week Peng, Albin, Kathi and Felix went back to Monte Bondone to dismantle the equipment of our first grassland advection campaign- looking forward to some exciting data!

item.title: Advection experiment at Monte Bondone started
item.description: Earlier this week, Peng, Albin, Kathi and Georg were at Monte Bondone to set up the first grassland advection experiment. The pictures below show some impressions of the field work and setup; here a short fun movie can be found.
